arts.ttl: "He's a huge talent" – Kovac full of praise for Vuskovic
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund coach Niko Kovač has sung the praises of his Croatian countryman Luka Vuskovic.

arts.ttl: Hamburger SV vs. Borussia Dortmund preview: BVB looking for positive response
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund will look to bounce back from their heavy Champions League defeat to Manchester City when they take on Hamburger SV in Saturday’s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Preview | Hamburger SV vs Borussia Dortmund: The return of Niko Kovač
arts.sum: On Saturday afternoon, Hamburger SV will be hoping to cause an upset and beat Borussia Dortmund, giving them a much-needed victory after three loses on the bounce. Standing in their…
